name: run_simple
signature: def run_simple(hostname: 'str', port: 'int', application: 'WSGIApplication', use_reloader: 'bool' = False, use_debugger: 'bool' = False, use_evalex: 'bool' = True, extra_files: 't.Iterable[str] | None' = None, exclude_patterns: 't.Iterable[str] | None' = None, reloader_interval: 'int' = 1, reloader_type: 'str' = 'auto', threaded: 'bool' = False, processes: 'int' = 1, request_handler: 'type[WSGIRequestHandler] | None' = None, static_files: 'dict[str, str | tuple[str, str]] | None' = None, passthrough_errors: 'bool' = False, ssl_context: '_TSSLContextArg | None' = None) -> 'None'
